question:
You have seen an advertisement in a newspaper for a job in the city post office during your holidays. You decide to apply for the job.
Write a letter to the director of the post office. In your letter,
•	introduce yourself
•	explain what experience and special skills you have
•	explain why you are interested in the job
text: I am writing this letter to apply for the job in your Post Office. I came to know about this through the advertisement in the newspaper. I am quite interested in this opportunity. I would like to work in the Post Office for the next three months during my holidays.

I am currently pursuing a three-year diploma course in Arts and History. I have just appeared for my second-year final term exams. I wish to make use of my summer vacation before the final year of my course begins.

I am quite well-versed in the courier related works. In last summer during my holidays, I worked in FedEx for three months. There I was engaged collecting items from customers, and pack those before shipment. I possess good communication skills and excellent command of the local language to communicate with customers.

I have always been fascinated by interacting with new people. Actually, I aspire to become a historian in the future. I am also planning to travel across the world as much as possible to learn more. This job will help me fulfil at least some of these goals by earning me an income.
I look forward to hearing from you.
